title: True Meaning of Tapasya | Sri Vasudev Keshav Dasa | ISKCON Bangalore Sanga
speaker: HG Vasudev Keshav Dasa

segments.key_quote: All our austerities are actually centered around devotional service.
segments.summary: The speaker explains that true austerity (Tapasya) is centered around devotional service to Krishna, not material gains, and that even traditional Vratas are only beneficial on a material plane unless connected to Krishna consciousness.
